Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25153 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 20.10.14-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-25153 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 20.10.14-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 20.10.14-7, affected by CVE-2023-25153
